channel.title: Ehud Olmert on Liam Getreu

item.title: NIF event: Peace, War and the Future with Former Israeli Prime Minister Ehud Olmert
item.description: I interviewed former Israeli Prime Minister Ehud Olmert for an NIF event about his latest book Searching for Peace, his new political memoir.
